name: Musician Life Simulator - TCP4
description:
This game was developed for a Course Completion of Period 4 (TCP IV) of the Digital Games course at the Federal Institute of Science, Education and Technology of Rio de Janeiro, Campus Engenheiro Paulo de Frontin.

High Concept

The player's objective is to play on international concerts. 

Building energy and mental health, he aims to gain fame and money, through internet videos/ musical concerts.

To achieve this, he needs to hone his musical skills and chase his dreams.

Lore

{player}'s grandfather has always been an amateur musician whose dream was to play in a big show.

After a few years, due to leukemia, the {player} loses his grandfather, who leaves his most precious asset, his Drums.

Upon receiving that drum set, which was the first instrument he "played with", he decides that he will fulfill his grandfather's dream and star on stage.
